text: Line 8 or L8, coloured pink (termini: Plaça Espanya - Molí Nou-Ciutat Cooperativa) and ran by FGC, is part of the Barcelona Metro network. It joins Plaça Espanya, in the Sants-Montjuïc district of Barcelona with the metropolitan area cities of L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Cornellà de Llobregat and Sant Boi. == Technical details == * Colour on map: pink * Number of stations: 11 * Length: * Journey time: 30 minutes * Traction: Electricity * Open-air sections: Yes (Between Cornellà-Riera and Molí Nou-Ciutat Cooperativa) * Mobile phone coverage: All line * Depots: Martorell * Operator: FGC == Current stations == *Plaça Espanya (L1, L3) *Magòria-La Campana *Ildefons Cerdà *Europa-Fira (L9) *Gornal (RENFE) *Sant Josep *Avinguda Carrilet (L1) *Almeda *Cornellà-Riera *Sant Boi *Molí Nou-Ciutat Cooperativa == Other websites == *Line 8 at Trenscat.com *Line 8 at TransporteBCN.es 8
title: Barcelona Metro line 8
